div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiij die mensis februarij anno quo Supra

Eodem die comparuerunt cristina blinsele cum Andrea
lousone Sponso suo Matheus Wricht procuratorio nomine
Elizibetht blinsele sponse sue et mariote blinsele
filie et heredes quondam Walterj blinsele burgensis dicti burgi
non vi aut metu ducte nec errore lapse seu aliquo
dolo vel fraude circumuente sed scia mera pura ac
Spiritualia voluntate omni Jurj et Juris clameo proprietati
et possessionj que et quas hunc habuerunt aut habere
poterint in et ad quandam terram Jacentem infra dictum burgum
in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi
futhes ex australi et terram Willelmi Wormet ex boreali pro se
heredibus suis et suis assignatis quieteclamarunt et renunciarunt imperpetuum
per quadam certa summa pecunie sibi per honorabilem virum Robertum
blinsel comburgensem dicti burgi in pecunia munerata
personaliter sibique Roberto Reuersionem per eum alias de huiusmodi terra
fact' diliberarunt cum Cartis litteris sasine et aliis euidenciis
eandem concernentibus quibuscumque approban' et ratifican' sasinam statum
ac posicionem hereditar' predicte terre cum pertinenciis alias prefato Roberto
tradit' Ac Renunciand' huiusmodi reuersionj et omnibus in eadem contentis
Imperpetuum

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die mensis februarij anno quo Supra

the saide day the balyeis with avis' of the court ordanit
Williame gray to pay to mastir alexander bysset ix s' and iiij d'
of annuele avand to him or ellis to restor' the almary agan
apone the grond' And gif the said' William can schew ony vthir
gudis strenyeable' for the said annuell pertening to Robert glenmaluin
and cane preiw the said almary his the said clerk beand' pait
that he bruk his almary

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was
gevin for dome that Eduard top had Sufficientlie preuit the
Set and tak of the half nethis fischingis of the furdis maid' to him
vndir the sale of thome of mar' for this yer' and the tua borrouis
strekit one hime ane for the said' demi nethis fisching' and ane for the
half neth' was nayn' of availe and that the said' Eduard suld' Joys'
the fischingis and the said' demi nethis this yer

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Androw murrary forspekar that Jonhne philp sal pay to
Duncan Colison xlviij s' for the male of ane lost
iij yeris bigane quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

The said' day Jonhne of auchneyve grantit to ansuer'
for his wyf this day viij dais tile Elizibeth setone
for the wranguys' haldin fra hir' of ane Siluer belt

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Androw
murray forspekar that patrik chernsid' Is quyt of the frethin of
Jonhne philp of xlviij s' avand' to Duncan Colison' for ane
lost male

The saide day the balyeis assignit tuysday cum viij dais
to Williame Kenoche to ansuer to the borghe Strekit
one him be henry bavne for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xiij s' and vj d' perempturlie

the said' day Katherine branche resavit fra sere Jonhne
Stirueling tuentj ane franche crovnis and sex s'
of quhit money quhilkis he hed' in his handis of
heris resavit fra Androw ancroft And' William of chamer
Come Souerte that the saide money suld' be kepit to the
profit of the saide Katherine And' In continent the said'
William deliuerit the said' money agane to the saide
sere Jonhne in keping to the vtilite of the saide
Katherine with avys' of hir' modir In presence of the
haill court to be deliuerit agane to the said' domicele quhen
euire he beis Requirit tharto be hir' ande hir' modir

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die februarij anno quo Supra

the saide day alexander rede with consent of Elizibeth Steuart douchtir
tile vmquhile Jonhne Steuart In the name of Anny rede the
videw of the saide Jonhne deliuerit tile alexander gray ane chartir
of his land liand' in the gallowgat vteuthe the port betuix the
land of Dauid Adamson' one the northt and the land vmquhile
Duncan lundoris one the Southt tua chartiris and ane Instrument
of Sesin of the forland' in the nethirkirkgat and j letter com vndir
the common' sele for ane mes' Ilkan oulk at Sanct James
altar / In ferme keping' to be deliuerit to Androw Steuart sone
and ayr' tile vmquhill the saide Jonhne and he be lyvand' at his
hame cumin And' falyeing' of him to the said Elizibeth or the
nerrast lauche ayr' or ayris without ony Impediment

the saide day the borghe Strekit one William of gereauche
be Johne auchneyve that he av to releyve him of fyve rinsche
guthtlingis extending to v vnicornis that he borrouit to Susten'
his schip et cetera was fundin of nane avale be ane Suorne assis'
thomas leslie forspekar for the quhilkis the said' Johne was in ane
amerciament of the Court et cetera and the said' William quyt of his challance

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas
leslie forspekar that William Walcar' sale pay xij s' to Johne
thomsone of the male befor martimes bigan and the martymes
maile last bigane

the saide day comperit Alexander hay and offerit him redy tile Alexander ansuer'
at the Instance of alexander Robertsone in banf for ale thingis that
he hed' to say to him as day assignit to the said' alexander
and his borrouis fundin that is to say alexander tullauche and William
Dauisone as he allegit And' be caus' the said Alexander Robertson'
comperit nocht the said' alexander hay protestit his borrouis freid'
and for his Costis skathis and expensis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xix die mensis februarij anno quo Supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per legitimam Inquisicionem Curie
quod Katherina branche filia quondam Andree branche est
legitime etatis extra tutoriam

Eodem die Katherina branche filia Andree branche elegit
creauit constituit et nominauit Willelmum chamer suum legitimum Indubitatum
et Irreuocabilem Curatum ad regendum gubernandum defendendum
et Sustinendum se sua bona terras ac possessiones quoscumque
quousque venerit ad legitimam etatem qui quondam Willelmus obligauit
se preposito et ballivis responsurus et Caucionarium pro firma Custodia
bonorum dicte Katherine pertinen' ad suum commodum et vtilitatem
per suas possessiones bona et terras disponend'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die
mensis februarij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod
Dauid Mar' est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam thome
mar patris suj Et datum fuit in mandatis Johanni mar'
balliuo ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terras suas et annuos
Redditus sibi Jure hereditario contingen'

Eodem die comparuit Johannes Cullane prelocutorio nomine Dauid club
presentis et consencientis asserit et exposuit eundem Dauid possessione
cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico furcarum inter terram Johannis myle ex
australi et terram Dauid mar' senioris ex boreali Igitur protestabatur ut ballivi
saam eiusdem Dauid mar' Juniori nullatenus tradant seu tradat
ac pro Juris Remedio

Eodem die Dauid Mar' Junior conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore patricij leslie prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Sponse Dauid
club Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die mariota club conuicta fuit per assisam Juratam ex
ore patricij leslie prelocutoris assise pro perturbio David mar' Junioris
In qua prima mocio fuit perturbij quoniam Insimul perturbauerunt Cuj
emendabit et cetera

Eodem die Dauid mar' Junior conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore patricij leslie perpro perturbio Iniusta expulsione Johannis synne
de domo sua Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Cullan prelocutorio Nomine quo Supra in medio
produxit protectionem Serenissimi domini nostri regis Dauid club essam
asseren' eandem super eum per Dauid mar' Juniorem fract' protestan'
Solempniter pro Juris Remedio

Eodem die Johannes Cullan deuenit plegius legalis quod Dauid mar'
Junior erit Indempnis pro David club aliter quam per viam iuris
Et patricius Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Dauid mar'
Club erat Indempnis pro dicto David club aliter quam per viam Juris
Et quolibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum suos fideiussores

the saide day the balye chargit philp of Dunbrek seriand to
arrest the annuell Rent of x s' pertening tile Anny atkin
of ane land in the skulhile quhile scho fred' William Walcar'
of the Somes aucht to him be the saide Anny

Eodem die comparuit gilliame balye gallicus et sua Spontanea
voluntate exonerauit et quieteclamauit Johannem Meldrum de
clameo octodecim coronas vsualis monete scocie sibi debit'
per Johannem Stevin prout in actis librj communis dicti burgi continetur
Ac fideliter promisit nunquam prosequi aliquem seu aliquos pro huiusmodi
summas exceptis dicto Johanne Stevin heredibus suis executoribus et assignatis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxiiijto die mensis februarij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem
Curie quod Johannes branche filius quondam Andree
branche est legittime etatis et extra tutoriam

Eodem die Johannes branche elegit fecit constituit
creauit et nominauit Willelmum chamer suum legittimum verum et Indubitatum Irrevocabilem
Curatum in vberiore forma qua fierj peterit ad Regendum se
sua bona sua ac posiciones quascumque quousque peruenerit ad
perfectam etatem ad commodum suum disponendum pro quibus dictus
Willelmus inuenit Johannem Retre Caucionarium et plegium
preposito et ballivis responsurus pro firma Custodia bonorum dicto
Johanni contingen' conuen per terras bona ac posiciones quascumque
quem dictus Willelmus heredes suos executores et assignatos Indempnes
pro huiusmodi fudeiussione fideiussione fideliter conseruare promisit per omnia bona
sua presencia et futura

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die februarij

the said' day the aldirman and balyes ordanit Androw nachtj to
warne Johne auchneyve and William gareauche to comper
one monunday that nixt cumis to ansuer' to Elizibeth seton'
for the haldin of hir' belt

the saide day William Kennoche offerit him redy
to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be henry
bavne for' the wranguys' haldin fra him of xiij s'
and vj d' and fand' nay man to follou him tharfor he
protestit to be quyt of his challance quhil he be
follouit with new soit /

The saide day Alexander hay litstar tuk him to preyve
Androw Culan yongar pait of the money aucht to him
for j pip of wad' and vthir merchandice one monunday
that nixt cumis excep xxj s'

the said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Thome leslie forspekar that Duncan Colison' sal pay to
Sandy malison' vij s' and vj d' for Thoppy
Angoson' and the saide Alexander sal kep the said Duncan
skathles tharof at the handis of David arrot and the
sad' toppe Angoson' quhilk the said Alexander grantit
be his avne gravnt and the said' Jame Duncan for him self
befor Jhon mar' balye philp Dunbrek Androw nachtj James leslie and William Scrimgeor
seriandis

the said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne
assis' Johne Wilsone wobstar forspekar that Johne of
futy sal pay to Sandy Rolland' vj s' and iiij d'
for the skath done in his workmanschip to his
clath extending to ix eln' and demi for the quhilk
the sade Johne was in Amerciament of the Court

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis marcij anno quo Supra

the said' day Jonhne smyth in balheluys grantit him
avand' to Jonhne mathousone and his wyf xltj s' and
tuk to preyve tham pait of the said' money

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the
Court assignit the ix day of the monetht of marche
Instan' to mathou branche to ansuer' peremptiorlie
to the borghe' strekit one him be William henrison'
for the wranguys' haldin fra him of fiwe franche
Crovnis /

the saide day Williame gareauche callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to Elizibetht setone for the wranguis' haldin
fra hir' of ane Siluer tuschey scho gevand' j siluer
pece of v vncez' thai ordanit Androw nachtj to tak ane distres'
et cetera and warne him agane friday that nixt cumis as secund day

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' gilbert menzes forspekar that Johne smitht in balheluis
is avand' to Johne mathoson' in futy xl s'

Eodem die Johannes Cullan Alexander Rede gilbertus menyes
et thomas leslie electi fuerunt per margaretam Kintor Relictam
Andree branche ex vna et Willelmum de Camera Curatorem Kathe
rine branche et Johannis branche et matheum branche suum
fratrem partibus ab altera ad
